Dear Jane,

We are reaching out to inform you about an urgent security update at SafeSecurity, your organization.

Recently, we have identified a potential threat to our system that requires immediate attention. To ensure the safety of our data and the integrity of our network, we kindly request all employees to update their login credentials.

Please click here to proceed with the mandatory password reset process.

As one of the leaders at SafeSecurity, we value your commitment to maintaining a secure work environment. By following this protocol, you will contribute to our collective effort to protect our organization from potential cyber attacks.

If you have any questions or need assistance, please do not hesitate to reach out to our IT department.

Thank you for your cooperation.

Best regards,
[Random Name]
